config.Price Changes.description: 调整作物以及作物相关制品的售价。
config.Crops.description: 调整作物以及作物相关制品的售价。
config.Flowers.description: 调整花卉售价及商店内花卉种子的价格，这也会影响花卉蜂蜜。
config.Animals.description: 调整动物产物的售价及大型动物制品的产出方式。
config.Fruit Trees.description: 调整果树产品的销售价格以及果树树苗在商店的价格。
config.Mines.description: 调整宝石，矿石，矿锭，怪物战利品，谷物以及晶球矿物的售价。这同样会影响宝石复制机的工作时间。
config.Miscellaneous Items.description: 调整一些杂项物品的售价。
config.Machines.description: 更改加工机械配方。(SLIGHTLY CHANGED)
config.Wild Seeds.description: 更改野生种子与茶苗配方。
config.Miscellaneous Recipes.description: 更改一些其他杂项的配方。
config.Cotton per Cloth.description: Amount of cotton bolls that produce cloth in a loom.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Monster Eradication Goals.descrip: 减少冒险家工会里为完成怪物击杀目标所需要的怪物击杀数量。
config.Item Categories.description: 调整物品的类别（加工产品，动物产品等等）。(SLIGHTLY CHANGED)
config.Food Buffs.description: 改变食物的buff、持续时间和食用属性。
config.Buildings.description: 直接影响利润的建筑成本更高，而其他建筑成本更低。
config.Museum Rewards.description: 优化博物馆的奖励顺序，使其更有回报。
config.Shops.description: 更改商店所售物的价格、库存，并限制某些商品的数量。
config.Artisan Goods.description: Artisan Goods Gain Quantity: Changes artisan goods to have a chance to increase in quantity based on ingredient quality. Large Animal Products Make 2: Doubles output for large animal products to allow for better compatability with Artisan Goods copy quality mods, for example Walk of Life.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Merchants Buy More Items.descript: 威利商店现在买鱼竿，玛尼商店买剪刀和牛奶桶，克林特商店买武器和盔甲。
config.Marnie Sells Auto-Petter.descript: 玛尼在社区中心完全重建后出售汽车自动抚摸机。
config.Harvey's Clinic Sells Life Elixir: 哈维诊所每天出售数量有限的生命药水。
config.Increased Silo Size.description: 将筒仓的干草容量上限提升至1000。
config.Remove Seeds from Shops.descripti: If Cornucopia More Crops or Flowers is installed new seed entries will be added to shops. Enabling this will prevent that. Should stay disabled unless other mods are used that remove all seeds from shops.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Stardew Valley Expanded.descripti: 允许该mod重新平衡SVE的鱼类、食品、杂项物品和商店。在大多数情况下，您应该保持该选项为启用状态，然后设置其他选项。如果未安装Stardew Valley Expanded，则不执行任何操作。(SLIGHTLY CHANGED)
config.Ridgeside Village.description: 允许该mod重新平衡RSV的鱼类、食品、杂项物品和商店。在大多数情况下，您应该保持该选项为启用状态，然后设置其他选项。如果未安装Ridgeside Village，则不执行任何操作。
config.Distant Lands.description: 允许该mod重新平衡Distant Lands的鱼类、食品、杂项物品和商店。在大多数情况下，您应该保持该选项为启用状态，然后设置其他选项。如果未安装Distant Lands，则不执行任何操作。
config.East Scarp.description: 允许该mod重新平衡East Scarp的鱼类、食品、杂项物品和商店。在大多数情况下，您应该保持该选项为启用状态，然后设置其他选项。如果未安装East Scarp，则不执行任何操作
Sheep: 成年的棉羊可以每隔几天修剪一次羊毛。收割羊毛需要一把剪刀。绵羊将住在畜棚里。
config.Cornucopia More Crops.description: Allows the mod to rebalance crops, fruit trees, bushes and artisan goods from Cornucopia More Crops. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings. Does nothing if Cornucopia More Crops is not installed.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Cornucopia More Flowers.descripti: Allows the mod to rebalance crops, fruit trees and bushes from Cornucopia More Flowers. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings. Does nothing if Cornucopia More Flowers is not installed.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Cornucopia Artisan machines.descr: Allows the mod to rebalance artisan goods and machines from Cornucopia Artisan Machines. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings. Does nothing if Cornucopia Artisan Machines is not installed.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Animal Husbandry Mod.description: Allows the mod to rebalance items and food from Animal Husbandry Mod. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings. Does nothing if Animal Husbandry Mod is not installed.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Mizu's Quail.description: Allows the mod to rebalance animals, items and food from Mizu's Quail. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings. Does nothing if Mizu's Quail is not installed.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
config.Mizu's Turkey.description: Allows the mod to rebalance animals, items and food from Mizu's Turkey. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings. Does nothing if Mizu's Turkey is not installed.(NEW TRANSLATION REQUIRED)
